dct_title_s: The place of Paradise, the habitation of Adam and Seth, and the Land of Nod
dct_description_sm: Maps shows parts of Turkey, Iran, Armenia and the Caucasus; relief shown pictorially. From: Stackhouse, Thomas. A new history of the Holy Bible, London, 1752, Vol.I, p.24.
